job.title: Staff Software Engineer, Data Visibility & Attestation (Security)
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongSquare builds common business tools in unconventional ways so more people can start run and grow their businesses When Square started it was difficult and expensive or just plain impossible for some businesses to take credit cards Square made credit card payments possible for all by turning a mobile phone into a credit card reader Since then Square has been building an entire business toolkit of both hardware and software products including Square Capital Square Terminal Square Payroll and more Were working to find new and better ways to help businesses succeed on their own termsand were looking for people like you to help shape tomorrow at SquarebrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongAsset management is a core tenet of Information Security traditionally captured through hardware and software asset management As the company grows data increasingly becomes an important asset that requires active tracking and management in order to ensure we are building and maintaining appropriate data protectionbrbrAs a Tech Lead on the Privacy Engineering team you will define the broad direction and future of the Data VisibilityAttestation group which is focused on building out and continuously improving the accuracy of our data inventory as our systems continue to evolve in number and complexity You will operate on the critical path of surfacing data risk on all Square products and business units and will have a direct impact on the success of security and privacy of data at Square In this role you will closely work with many teams across Square including other teams within security as well as platform engineering product engineering data science and counselbrbrstronguYou Should Expect TobrustrongulliCollaborate with leaders across security platform data science and counsel to translate data visibility requirements into technical solutionsliliDesign develop and test highquality services or infrastructure that support longterm data visibilityattestation needs across the organizationliliSet broad direction and vision influence engineering and business strategy and establish practices to efficiently and effectively address data security and privacy needs across Squares engineering ecosystemliliProvide mentorship and reviews for engineering teams working with data visibilityattestation technologiesliliWork with the engineering manager to oversee the success of the teamaposs projects and deliver quantifiable resultsbrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongSome qualifications you may havebrulli8 years of hands on software engineering experienceliliExcellent software engineering knowledge and the ability to provide technical mentorship and guidanceliliA high bar for writing quality scalable robust and testable codeliliRelevant engineering experience in data inventorying and classification to support security and privacy processes at scaleliliExperience collaborating with security and engineering crossfunctional leaders liliAbility to learn new technologies and languagesliliAbility to cut across new or existing services infrastructure or frameworks to achieve security and privacy goalsliliStrong communication skills Youre adept at understanding complex technical concepts and helping your team make decisions to move forward as well as communicating those decisions upliliEffective remote collaboration skills with distributed teamsbrliulAs a bonus you may have experience or interest inbrulliDeveloping incident response processes or toolingliliDeveloping or maintaining processes to meet data governance needsliliBuilding novel visualizations to understand data flow access control and riskbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongWere working to build a more inclusive economy where our customers have equal access to opportunity and we strive to live by these same values in building our workplace Square is a proud equal opportunity employer We work hard to evaluate all employees and job applicants consistently without regard to race color religion gender national origin age disability veteran status pregnancy gender expression or identity sexual orientation citizenship or any other legally protected classbrbrWe believe in being fair and are committed to an inclusive interview experience including
